        @Nullable
public <T> T get(@Nonnull
                           String key,
                           @Nullable
                           T defaultValue)
        Description copied from interface: Context
        Returns the value associated with the given key. This operation will traverse up the context hierarchy until it finds a key.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Context
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the value
        Parameters:
        key - the key to search
        defaultValue - the value to be returned if the key was not found

      • getAt

        @Nullable
public Object getAt(@Nonnull
                              String key)
        Description copied from interface: Context
        Returns the value associated with the given key. This operation will traverse up the context hierarchy until it finds a key. Convenience method to use in Groovy aware environments.
        Specified by:
        getAt in interface Context
        Parameters:
        key - the key to search
        Returns:
        the value associated with the key or null< if not found.

        defaultValue - the value to be returned if the key is not found
